imdb.plot outline: This comedy/drama involves a group of so-called best friends who all benefit off of each other's sketchy past. When Chanel, played by Natali Micciche, asks her best friend Raven, played by Ashleigh Whitfield, for a huge favor, Raven can't resist. A mistake from Raven's past resurfaces as this "favor" becomes a manipulation game between the two friends. The love interests between the two ladies, Steven, Terrence Prince, and Josh, played by Christian McClure, are entangled in their own turmoil, however, this drama remains unbeknownst to one of the men.
imdb.title: Best Friends with Benefits
